choices: Wait on Bike Seat For Him to Come
Dylan comes over to play with Damien and to go to school
1.content:
On a fine Tuesday morning you and your friend Damien decided to take a shortcut through the park to get to school a little faster.

Walking along with Damien while he is riding his bike(you forgot yours) the two of you pass the bathrooms and drinking fountains when your throat feels a little dry.


"Hey Dude I'm getting kinda thirsty I'm gonna drink from the fountain" You say be for walking off.

"Okay but I'm only going to wait a few minutes thou", He hollers back. You go to drink some water from the fountain that is near the bathroom. As your feeling the cool water travel down your throat it starts to go form it's normal taste (not that great tasting anyway) to a slimy almost acid like taste. You immediately you pull away choking trying to get the burning feeling to subside. When it finally does you rub your head and start thinking of how that could of happened before leaving the bathroom. Suddenly dizziness hits you, feeling everything go black you fall down while passing unconscious.

When you finally awake you feel unnaturally ..bare. Looking over yourself you gasp as you've come to realize that your naked. Blushing madly due to remembering where you are you look around for your clothes and hope no one has seen you. You stop though after noticing that something is wrong with your surroundings. You weren't certain but pretty sure that any of the buildings near this park where built as big as the one in front of you which looks several stories tall. Looking up as far as you can you see a giant sign on the door that says 'MEN' You try and figure out why that's on this building when your thoughts are interrupted by by a quaking 'BOOM!'. You look around the noise created was deafening, where was it coming from? The noise repeated it's self several times and the you feel the ground around you begin to vibrate.

Turning around fully you see two HUGE...things... moving towards you. they are far enough off that you can see what look like giant blue pillars riding out of the back of each, following the columns up your eyes grow ride and your jaw drops. You see the now titan size form of your best friend above you. That means the blue columns are his legs inside the jeans he's wearing, and the two giant things in front of you must be his now giant feet.

"D-Damien?" you gasp up at him. You see his head turn in your direction and wonder if he's able to hear you. All thoughts of that however are crushed when he lifts one of his feet and begins walking towards you while not even bothering to look down.

Letting out a scream you take off realizing the danger your in as the giant sneakers are slamming on the ground closing in on you.

You force yourself to move faster but your hopes are dimmed a shoe shape shadow comes over you. Then in the same moment the shadow starts to expand rapidly!

Jumping to the left to avoid getting crushed you thankfully make it out of Damien's path right as his foot slammed into the ground with a violent BOOM so hard, you and several specks of gust were sent hurtling away from it. He continues on walking not noticing that he almost crushed his friend.

You pull yourself up to your feet and look for the guy who tried killing you. Damien has stopped walking and has taken a seat on a nearby park bench.

What should you do now?
1.title: The Beginning

13.content:
You decide to wait on his bike seat.

This proved to be a poor choice as Damien got tired of waiting and went to go sit on his bike seat... ON YOU!

Quick! Do you dodge in time?
13.title: Wait on bike seat for him to come.

14.content:
You decided that trying to climb Damien would take to long so you started walking over to him.

After several minutes of walking you finally reach his feet and very cautiously approach his right one. Both feet are flat on the ground as Damien is playing on his phone, so you take a chance and start to climb up it. The shoe has a mesh under layer that gave you several small foot holes allowing you to climb onto the top of the foot.

Luckily you see that the shoe you are on lace is untied so he will have to tie it before walking. Waiting a few more minutes you hear Damien stop playing his game and look up to see him bend the shoe and reach his hands down to tie the laces. Noticing the the situation you run to him flailing your arms and screaming.

"Damien! Hey down here on the shoe!" you yell hoping for all your worth that he hears you. Thinking it worked due to him shifting his head and looking down at you, you come to a halt right at the start of the shoes tongue. Your nervous as he stares down at you. With a swift movement his hand is in front of you, as if to pick you up. You start to walk forward when his hand switches positions and the middle finger folds back into the thumb with the other fingers pointed straight out.

You draw breathe as to scream when the middle finger flicks out at you.


Damien watches with mild interest as he mercilessly flicks the bug off his shoe and land about a foot away.

The tree trunk finger crashes into you with enough force to make you cough up blood, it doesnt end as the force sends you flying from the shoe. Shooting through the air you manage to end up landing in a bit of mud on the ground, saving you from a bloody end. Slowly you get up while coughing heavily. With no time to rest Damien speaks.

"Well what do we have hear?" he smirks threateningly down at you.
14.title: The Feet of a Titan

141.content:
Damien stares down at you for a moment before smirking wildly making you very nervous.

"Well if it isn't some unlucky little bug that happens to be in the wrong place at the wrong time." Now you were scared as he's recognized you as a bug instead of a human.

"Hmm I wonder what would be the best way to kill a thing as meaningless as you?" He sub consciously shifted his left foot in a bit and easily pinned you against the other foot.
141.title: Bug

1411.content:
"Hmm, I guess I'll just run the bug over with my bike" Damien thought out loud.

Without sparing you a second glance he walks over to his bike and hops on while kicking up the kickstand. He puts his feet on the peddles while leaning his body weight forward and pushing off the ground simultaneously.

The moment he had started to walk off you took your chance and ran for it!. You sprint as fast as possible across the concrete trying to find someway to hide yourself... when suddenly you hear the loud motion of a bike chain and tires grinding into the concrete. In an instant a shadow befalls you.

"DAMIEN PLEASE!" you shout as loud a possible while turning around... Only to be met by his front tire slamming into you forcing you on to the ground.

The pain was swift and immense, you shout as the tire crushes everything under you knees before rolling off. Still partly alive you see Damien high above you on his bike when his foot shift back from the peddle and pushes down on the kickstand. Your shout is caught in your throat as you watch the massive piece of metal come shooting down towards you.

Your head his ripped to the side as the kickstand has pinned you in between it and the ground, it had ripped you ear clean off. As blood pooled around you from you wounds you weakly watch as Damien's massive shoe touched the ground on it's tip and ever so slowly the rest of it followed quickly.

You never even got to close your eyes as the newly applied weight to the kickstand closed the gap between it and the ground while obliterating your form for good with a quick and small Crunch.

Damien only smirked as he heard the crunch before riding off.
1411.title: Road Kill

1412.content:
"I know!" Damien says snapping from his thoughts "I'll crush you in a 'special' way."

"But should I just do it here or at my place?" he asks himself.
1412.title: Shoe stain

14121.content:
Before you give him a chance to decide, you took off running in the opposite direction of Damein's feet.

"Where the Fuck do you think your going roach?" He asks as he looks down at you with an annoyed expression. The annoyance quickly turns into a smirk as he begins to slowly walk towards you making you feel like you could escape.

The only problem was the closer each one of his booming foot falls came to you the greater your almost thrown on you stomach. You were running for your life when Damien kicked a foot to the side, brought it quickly forward and swatted you with it like a small ball. You see the foot come flying at you and with no time to dodge it the shoe slams into you and sends you flying sideways into the air; only to come crashing down a few feet away.

The slam ended up shattering most of the bones in your body. With you body flat on your stomach all you can do is groan and watch as Damien's giant sneakers approach you. with the little energy you had left you painfully force yourself onto your back in time to be in the shadow of Damein's sneaker, the red NIKE sign clearly visible.

"Well bug you gave a good chase", he said sarcastically and began to slowly lower his foot on to you.

You could see and feel the black rubber of the shoe start to slowly press down on your hard and harder. Your started to scream as loud as you possibly could in pain, you only scream for a second with your ribs snap and the broken bones are pushed through your organs and forces up heaps of blood from your mouth slowly choking you.

Damien ready to go to school and tired of waiting for you to come back presses his foot down all the way and twists it a few time's listening to the 'bug's' bones crunch underneath his shoe. He lifts his foot up and couldn't make out any recognizable part of the body.

He gave a small chuckle before noticing that the head of the bug was still moving just barley. Instead of crushing it however, he hocked up a lugi and spit it out on your head. He finally got on his bike before riding off to school.

(your pov after the foot smashing)

You are in unimaginable pain by the time Damien lifts his foot off you. Your godly surprised to be alive even in so much pain. You start to hope Damien will leave, but your hope ends when you hear a loud gurgling noise come from him. You look up in time to see him hock a lugi the size of your body at your head. Being unable to move any other part of your body after the foot smash you are plunged into the lugi the snot gluing all aiways into your body shut. You see Damien get on his bike and ride off.

Your last moments are spent in agonizing pain as you slowly drown in your best friends spit.
14121.title: Dead fleeing roach

14122.content:
As your forced to look up at Damien while he is thinking, your scared to death.

'He really wants to kill me", you think to yourself. In a few seconds he says, "I'll do this at my house". He then reaches down for you.

Since you can't move he easily picks you up in between his thumb and index finger. "Now little bug don't think that I'm going to just carry you to my house,"

He starts taping you to the front of his bike positioning you to where all you can see is the front tire. "He then gets on his bike and leaves the park. When he does this his normal weight lowerd the bike a bit like usual but, you could now get hit by the tires spike grips and Damien wouldn't even notice. He heads home, as the bike starts to move so does the tire.
14122.title: Bike strip

141221.content:
As Damien makes his way home you are in a thrill ride of your life and your scared as shit.

After about half and hour of riding he pulls into his driveway and gets off his bike while making his way to the garage. He parks his bike and rips off the piece of tape and goes inside the house closing the door behind him. By the time he makes it to the kitchen, the tapes adhesive was starting to weaken forcing you to grab onto it to keep from falling onto the wood tile below.

"Hey Damien!" A voice shouted making him stop moving.

"What?" he responded as several footsteps where heard and into the kitchen came Damien's younger brother Colin.

"Have you seen my basketball?" You looked up at Colin and were instantly transfixed on him.

He was shirtless with a soft four-pack of abs. He had muscle from his arms all the way down to his ankles. They were not giving him a bulk over muscle look but just something to his form. He had blond hair that fell to just above his eye brows. He was wearing a pair of dark red and black basketball shorts that went to his knees. The leg hairs appeared to be trimmed down adding to the appeal. He was sporting a pair of black Nike Reax which looked to be brand new.


"Check under the table, that's where it rolled last time". Damien spoke before quickly turning around and walking up the stairs to his bedroom. The motion was so fast and unexpected that you felt yourself pulled from the tape. reaching your arms out you try to grab on to the tape to keep from falling.



Do you grab on?
141221.title: Make it to his house

1412211.content:
You are unable to get a hold on the tape and find yourself free falling to the floor of their kitchen shouting the whole way down. With a dull thud you crash onto the wood flooring. You dazily watch Damien's massive sneakers make boomong quakes as he heads off to his bedroom.

After a minute you clear your head and sit up. Checking yourself over you find yourself only bruised in a few places, standing up the rest of the way you look around and try to figure out where to go. You just decide on which direction to take when your interrupted another set of booming sounds.
You turn around and see that Colin has managed to find his basketball and has made his way to sit on one of the bar stools in the area. Taking a seat he pulls out his phone and makes a call, while doing so he idly starts to bounce the ball on the ground.

The Behemoth form of your friends younger brother was captivating to you but you where horrified of the massive noise that the ball was making every time it hit the ground. Each time it touched it made an earth shattering BOOOOM! that sent tidal wave of force vibrating through the wood floor boards making you entire body shake. Slowly but surely you walk backwards in an attempt to leave the range on the vibrations,

Your almost to the point where you feel you can turn away and run without Colin noticing you. You start turning around when he misses one of the bounces and the ball bounces away and starts rolling towards you.

You scream and start running in hopes that you could escape the impending fate that rolling towards you.

Colin's View

"Alright dude thanks for the ride see you in a few- Dammit" Colin grumbled as the ball slipped from his hand and went rolling away. Putting his phone in his pocket he went to go get it. Walking up to the basketball he simply put his foot on top of it to stop it from moving, while reaching down to retrieve the ball he stopped when he noticed a small speck on the floor. He stared at it for a second before speaking.

"Dammit not another bug" he complained while picking the ball up and standing up to his full height and glared down at the bug he was looking forward to crushing.

Your View

You were so focused on escaping the ball that you ended up tripping on a small crack in the wood you crash down. You huddle up into ball as the baskets shadow rolls over your form. You lay there waiting for the pain of being steam rolled to over take you... but hearing a few booming noises all the sound stops.

You slowly opened your eyes to see your self in the shadow of the basketball but it that is not what has your attention. Looking at the top of the ball you see a gigantic footing resting on top of it, glancing up as high as you could you see Colin standing high above you. Not thinking twice you immediately start running towards your savior and start shouting to try and get his attention until you hear him speak.

"Dammit not another bug"

Those words got you to freeze in place in a instant. You watch as he reaches down all the way and grabs the ball before lifting up it the air. After waiting for a few moments a smirk appears on his face.
1412211.title: Magnetism!...Not

141222.content:
Your screaming as loud as you possibly can but the wind from Damien riding his bike was drowning out you minuscule voice. While he's riding you start noticing that the glue on the tape was starting to weaken. You prayed that it wouldn't fall off taking you with it.

Then Damien hits a bump.

You feel yourself ripped from the bike as the tape gives and you go falling off the bike and in front of the tire below you.

It all happens in a second but the pain is immense as the bike's weight combined with Damien's lands on top of you instantly smashing you to bits.

Damien only gave a soft laugh as he watched the piece of tape go under the pedal, not even feeling your body pop under the back tire.
141222.title: Paste

choices: You make it to his pocket
Dylan see's a bug on the ground
15.content:
As you stand behind the bench you see Dylan Ulgyer coming over to talk to Damien. While he drew closer you couldn't help but feel intimidated by the massive booming sounds his feet created as his Nikes crash down in rapid succession, it got so loud you had to cover your ears not to go deaf. He took one last step before sitting down, the force of the last step was strong enough to shoot a wind of gust at you blowing you back several feet, you hear the grinding of the shoes on the ground as Dylan turns and sits down.

Desperate to get their attention you run straight at Dylan's foot. Running until you get to the toe end of Dylan's shoe you see a lace hanging down and grab a hold of it, using it to pull yourself up and on top of the shoe. You hear what Damien and Dylan are talking about.

"Dude I can't just leave my bike here", says Damien
"Sure you can you have a bike lock with you don't you?" Asked Dylan.

After a minute of thinking Damien let out a sigh.

"fine."

"Good because I think I see my mom coming to take us to school."
Standing up the two head off to the car after Damien takes a moment lock up his bike.

You feel your world rapidly shift as they move and in a panic you quickly run up the shoe and grab onto the jeans just as Dylan starts walking. The repeated rise and booming fall of his foot encourages you to try climbing higher on his person to be kept from being blown off.

You make it up to the knee cap of the jeans when you hit a problem. Dylans knee keeps bucking into you with every step, threatening to knock you off the jeans and down below.

Can you hold on until they stop moving?
15.title: Questioning choices

151.content:
You close your eyes and hold on as tight as you can to Dylans jeans as his knees keeps bucking into you until you feel a really violent boom and loose your grip and fall.

You smack against Dylans shoe roll off it and hit the floor of the car. Looking up you see Dylan's massive feet hovering above you then they are quickly replaced by Damien's spiked Adidas which came crashing down right in front of you so all you could see was the front part of the shoe.

You slowly stand up and see Dylan and Damien talking. Deciding that you still need to get their attention you walk over to Damiens foot and begin to climb his shoe. You get about halfway up the shoe when Damien quickly shifted his foot and since you foot had just slipped into one of the strings lining the shoe you slipped and fell backwards with your foot catching on the string causing you to bash into the shoe and dangle upside down.

You tried to stay calm and relaxed in your situation,which was working until Dylan's mom put on Damiens favorite song Headstrong.Your world suddenly became hell as he started to drum his feet on the floor constantly banging you up and down so much you look like piece of dirt if not lint on his shoe.

When he finally stops drumming his feet the car is now pulling into the school parking lot. As you try to get out of your position the car stops with a jolt, suddenly you thrown into a never ending tornado as Damien gets out of the car and heads to breakfast table. Your screaming your head off as your head is less than two feet from a massive sole that could erase your existence in an instant. You see several other pairs of feet pass you by and are down heartened at the fact that no one seems to notice you.

Finally after almost ten minutes Damien sits down with a tray of school breakfast food and a drink. You holding on to your head to try an ease a developing migraine that was caused by the motion and the loud booms Damien's walking created. When the pain in your head leaves you start to struggle for a means of escape.
151.title: Trip Time

1511.content:
After several minutes of you struggling and Damien swinging his feet idly, you finally manged to force your self out of you bindings and land on the cold stone floor of the school. You keep an eye on Damien's massive feet as they continued to swing back and forth. You turn around just in time to have a HUGE shoe slam down in front of you with enough force to rattle you teeth.

You stare at the giant Reebok's sneakers as their owner walks by without even noticing your presence next to his shoe. DING DING DING a loud painful sound bursts out all around you deafening you after it stops you glace up and see several feet fly inches above you crashing down on either side of you and move again. you immediately start to run you cover 4 steps then BAMM! some one kicked you and you skidded several yards away into another shoe kicking you even harder. you skidded to a halt after to more times of being carelessly kicked like a bug.

You slowly stood up and you tried to think of what to do next to try and survive.
1511.title: From Adida spikes to lines of god like shoes

choices: Weston stands up and crushes you.
15111.content:
As you looked around, you saw across the hall a kid you recognized. cause of your size it took you a few moments to get a good view of the face but you recognized it as Weston Ruleman, he is your age and he's just standing in front of a door. You decided that he was your best bet right now so you took it.you glanced around to see who else was there and including Weston there was 10 people, meaning 20 feet that could crush you.

"Well i might as well go for it",you say before getting ready.

Off you went crossing the 5 1/2 yd long hallway to get to Weston.
just as you were a little over halfway there you suddenly see multiple shadows hover near you then BOOM! 3 sets of shoes crashed down next to you.

Well what do we have hear?,said a familiar voice. you looked up from the shoes and see 3 faces(2 of you already know) Damien,Dylan, and the third is a kid named Steven. oh its just a bug says Steven.
yeah but its in the hallway what do you think we should do with it?, asked Dylan. easy we smash it Steven replied back as he raised his foot over you, no wait said damein as his foot shot out knocking away Stevens foot. why don't we play a little hacky sack he said.

good with me ,the other 2 replied.then before you even took in your position they had moved into their places. ready...set......GO! yelled Steven as he ran forward and gave you a hard kick with his foot.

you felt the material smash against you and send you flying up in the air toward the ground, as you went spinning toward the ground you see Dylan's foot fly up and hit you with its sides 8 times before he finally launched you with the tip of his shoe.

you find your self heading over to damien. as he was getting ready to kick you but as he was his phone vibrated and he ended kicking you with his heel and it kicked you in the stomach,forcing for to cough up a fist full of blood. You smashed into the tile and skidded on it until you bash into another shoe and spun around to face the 3.

you were stuck directly in between Steven's heels where if he shifted his weight in the least there was a 100% chance of him crushing you to death.

"Were did the bug go"?, said Steven.

"I don't know", said damien. "Well your the one who kicked the stupid bug last."

"Yeah but even if we did find it, its probably dead i bet", said Dylan.

"He's right let's just go to class", said Damien. then they left.

steven took the tiniest step back and turned around to walk off.as soon as his foot hit the ground he felt the bug getting crushed so he smiled as he spun. when he stepped off he kicked back and felt your remain go flying.

Somehow your body was reforming painfully.
You looked up as best as you could from the position you were in without causing any pain to the part of your body that they had kicked (so pretty much all of it). You realize that you made it to your destination. Weston. But as you tried to stand you collapsed in pain every time. you could only lay there and stare at him until you recovered or until he notices you or moves his feet together.
15111.title: You see a that kid you recognize.

151112.content:
You lay there unable to move in between Weston's feet. You try to move several times but to no avail.

After about another 3 minutes you hear another bell go off and start to sweat with fear. You see Weston's hand move out from above you and grab his backpack, he starts to stand up and his feet begin to twist into the tile. The noise it made was amplified at your size five times greater making your ears actually bleed.
Finally Weston stand up to his full height with his feet on either side of your tiny broken form. The smell of rubber is almost over powering as the teen above sways to the side while casually waiting for the door to the class room to open.

"Weston! Please look down here!" You try and shout to him but it goes unheard for how high up he is. Suddenly the foot that is near you lifts up a little bit but it easily lifts over you casting a shadow over half of you. Shifting ever so slightly the massive structure comes down on your arm with unimaginable force so strong that your arm put up no resistance to the giant shoe. You scream in pain as blood seeps out from under the foot. You reach over and start weakly beating the shoe with you right arm.

As you slowly get used to the pain the foot lifts again though and shifts back a little bit before coming down again this time on your legs under your knee caps.you are filled with a whole new pain as you cant's see but you can feel blood start to form at what remains of your legs. You try desperately to pull your self away with you remaining arm but it is stopped as his foot comes slowly down once again smashing it as well.

Forcing yourself onto your back you look up to see his right foot lift all the way up to where it blocked out all light around you as it slowly lowers to the ground encompassing your entire body under it. As you stared at it the corpses of previous insect remains became visible until the soul of the shoe moves forward to the heel where the most of the body's weight is put on each step. The heel slams down on top your body and still keeps going.

The pressure builds to the point were you feel your body compressing under the foot.then when it will compress no further you feel the blood forced out of your smashed limbs allowing you to be compressed just a little further before...

SNAP!

You all out yelled as loud as you could as all your bones were crushed at once except your skull and neck but they were quickly going to.

Then the worst happens as Weston pivots on his heel. it took only a second but it instantly smashed you skull into your brain killing you, but over kill is inflicted as he spins it twists your corpse into the tile turning your body into nothing but paste. it only ends when the rest of the class arrives and they all step in the remains of your corpse's paste.

Hey you now know what a bug feels like when you step on it..
151112.title: Weston never noticed you.

15112.content:
you start to make your way into the crowd of kids to get noticed. only when you where in the middle of the students did your stupidity strike you but it was to late. as your stuck in middle of thousands of loud booming noises before you can turn around you feel a giant shadow engulf you. there you are face to face with the worlds biggest Nike Max Air Torch 4 White. then behind it you see the other one making its way to your exact spot you look up at the person you think you recognize him as one of your classmates yes his name is Weston.

HAY WESTON DOWN BY YOU FOOT DON"T STE-- was all you could say before the shoe came down on your bitter body. for how he stepped you landed on your back.you feel trapped under the shoe for a second before he adds his weight, the weight started to crush your body. you started to scream you in pure pain as your body was compressing under Weston's foot. it felt like hours of the pain being held there before your legs give a you hear a sickening crackling noise and screamed even loud but it is unheard as the shoes smashes the rest of your body into nothing more than a red smear on the floor. in reality it all happened in a bout a second.

Weston walked off never noticing your crushed body on the bottom of his shoe.
15112.title: your squished

1512.content: you start to wine cause you haven't eaten anything since dinner last night so you were starving and you could hear damien eating his food casually then a piece of the corn damien was eating fell from his spoon and landed right next to you. as you stick your head out to eat the gigantic piece damien moved his foot over the piece and crushed it under niethe his foot with a loud to you pop and then moved his foot back. your head slammed against the top of the corn. you looked at the corn before you started eating and notice it was smashed with a hole in the middle of it and giant black dirt marks surrounding it. it was completely cover in dirt from damien shoe. before oyu could think if you should still eat it damien stood up and went to his next class.as he walked you were once again forced to deal with the motion that causes so much pain damien entered his first class.
1512.title: you don't

choices: damien puts on his normal pair of shoes
he puts on his running shoes (the one's your in).
15121.content: as damien entered his gym class he kicked off his shoes and started to get changed. you go from being banged into the ground to spinning until you come to a dead stop. as the shoe tips back up all you can see is damien getting changed.no matter witch way you turned your head you stll had a full view of damien's teen body. as he finishes getting undressed he tosses his shirt on to his shoes blocking your view, immediatly you began to struggle as you know what will soon happen. damien goes to the bathroom. you manage to get out and you run to his locker as you get in it damien leaves the restroom and makes his way back..as his feet created booms on the floor you decided to hide in a pair of shoes he didn't wear normally.
15121.title: gym

choices: he puts on his right first
151212.content:
as you hide in damiens right running shoe you fell it fly backward and send you flying into the toe end of the shoe.
once he has them out he start redressing in his gym clothes. you run out back to the heel part and to see him getting dressed. before you can turn away damien's foot steps on the rest of the shoe.you are stuck watching damien as he dresses.once he's done instead of putting his sock on hr starts to put his shoes straight back on.
he tips the shoes so the toe end is facing up and the heel if facing down.as this happens you grab on to a few very loose strings to keep from falling.
151212.title: running shoes

1512121.content: as you start to slip you feel damiens foot enter the shoe, you loose your grip only to get pounded in the back as the foot hits you your forced back to the toe end of the shoe you got lucky cause you know for a fact because you know what would happen if you where under his foot.suddenly you like your part of a roller coaster constantly up and down
1512121.title: he puts on his right first

1512122.content: you hear him putting on his left first and your starting to lose your grip.then he slaps it on the ground causing a shudder violent enough to make you fall.as you hit the back of the shoe Damien puts his barefoot in toes first you feel a slight nudge as you look up to see Damien insert his foot you quickly stand up but before you could turn around you feel his heel hit you and bang you into the shoe then he tips it so you fall face first onto the floor of the shoe. you feel that his heel his barley touching your back you know what is about happen as you feel a tug on the back of the shoe then you feel the pressure increase as you puts his heel in forcing you in between a salty sweaty hell and moist hard shoe. for a second you feel completely weightless as Damien lifts his foot then slams it into the ground hard so he can tie it right.you feel a sudden rush of force pushing down on you then hits something equally as hard and it doesn't move. you can't breathe while Damien is tying his shoe.
1512122.title: left first

1513.content:
you start to slip through the hole and manage to get out. you start to run as fast as you can to get away from the foot. what you didn't notice was damiens other foot looming over you. you walk right into its shadow as it drops. you jump out of the way but only end up getting your lower half under the foot.you could tell that from the amount of pressure that was on your lower half indicated that he not putting all his weight on you.you look at the toe endand see that one of the spikes is barley touching you sack. then the worst happens when damien tilts the foot to the tip and lets his weight fall on it. as you stare at that spike you see it quickly drive straight down and pull you and your sack with it. you explode into p as the spike pulls you your sack under it. then you almost pass out when damien lets his weight fall and instantly crush your penis. then the foot lifts up and leaves a bleeding half consiouse you under it. when it lifts you see a bunch of light hit you and then it is blocked by another shadow.
damien decided to read so he removed a small book from his insanely heavy backpack and dropped it on the floor.
the shadow looms over you for a few seconds before it falls and smashes you in. the last thing you felt was a quick soft scratch material hit you then what felt like someone dropping building onto you and the rest was immense pain for about 30 seconds then splat.
1513.title: A Packing End

152.content:
Your holding on as hard as you can but, you quickly feel yourself letting go of the rough jeans.

Dylan's foot kicked the front of a rock and you end up letting go. For a few seconds you feel weightless as you fall, until you smack into the tip of Dylan's shoe and roll down and off of it as it is ascending.

You hit the ground on you back and yelp out loud in pain and look up to see the bottom of Dylan's foot as it is falling. You reach an arm to try to brace yourself but, it snaps like a twig with the rest of your body as the shoe slams into the ground, turning you into a pile of red paste.

"Huh"? Dylan questioned looking down at his shoe.

"What is it"? Damien asked back as they stopped moving.

"Nothing I think I just stepped on a bug." Dylan raised his foot and saw the tiny smashed "bug" corpse on the sole.

"Never mind that look your moms here let's go".


"Okay", Dylan replied: as he and Damien started to walk off, Dylan continuously smashed your remains into the ground until it fell off.

That was the last anyone ever saw of you, a glistening red corpse under a shoe of someone who didn't even spare you a second thought!
152.title: Quick End Solution

154.content:
Your holding on for your life as Dylan and Damien are walking to the car when suddenly, Dylan notices a bug on the ground. Watching the Cockroach for a few seconds he raises his foot up and slams it down hard onto the insect, vigorously wiping his foot back and forth to completely flatten the bug and it corpse.

The jarring motion of Dylan's foot hitting the ground so hard had reverberated throughout your entire being. When he started scraping it against the ground you were thrown off of his pant leg and crashed down painfully on his shoes tongue, flipping down it and stopping at about the top of the toe section of the shoe.

Dazily you slowly comeback to your surrounding and look up almost frightfully to see if Dylan or Damien had see you fall.

Did they?
154.title: Dylan see's a Bug on the Ground

1541.content:
as you where looking up at them dylan started to twist his foot smashing and mashing what was left of the bug underneath his shoe.cause of your clothing neither dylan nor damien saw your great 6 inch fall. you blended in perfectly with the tip of his shoe. they then start to make their way back to the car.you are forced to hug and bite the shoe as you hang on and struggle for dear life...

as they near the car you feel yourself staring to easily get bucked off his foot without any effort on his part. when dylan steps into the car you finally are forced off the super roller coaster and on to the cars dirty floor. you look up to see the tip of dylans shoe inches from your legs. before you can stand the foot drives straight into the floor of the car pinning and crushing you legs. your yell in pain is unheard to dylan and damien. as you are not able to move now all you can do is lay and wait as your legs are pummeled into the cars floor.when the car gets to school they head to class. when they get out of the car you go with them stuck to the tip of dylans shoe which ends quickly enough as when he gets out of the car the rest of you body is forced under the shoe as his full body weight comes down on it crushing you body along with what remains of the bugs. neither of them ever noticed that dylans foot has caused you death.
1541.title: Nope

1543.content: as you stared up at both of them dylan squinted at you. hey damien go on ahead i got to use the bathroom real quick.Okay? said damien. dylan then walked casually to the restroom. you were still fighting for your life as he walked. when he walked in to as empty stall he spun around (throwing you off) closed the door and sat down on the toilet. when you were thrown off you landed right in between his to titan like shoes. as you stood up you noticed how you didn't even come up to the material above the rubber.dude how did you get so small dylan asked getting your attention. i don't know you say. dylan looked as if he didn't hear you. you'll have to speak up for him to hear you. you yell the same thing to him but he hears it as barley audible squeaks from in between his shoes. wow that sucks he said.can you help me? you yell. i guess i could try but you have to pass a test first do you accept? the test.what is it you ask. a simple endurance and toughness test. ok i agree completely you say. ok the test is to survive in my shoe all day long.
1543.title: Dylan saw you

15431.content: without any concern for you dylan slid his foot out from the shoe and then he grabbed you hard and threw you in to the smelly shoe. you smack against the floor of the dark shoe with a small squash noise. I'll give you a minute to get comfy, immediately you run to the side of the shoe and try to climb the sweaty walls of the fortress like shoe. you slip and fall several times before he starts to put the shoe back on. you run to the toe end of the shoe to meet the expected smell dead end. but before you can reach it you are forced underneath the soul of his foul smelling socked foot. it lands on you with a ton of weight so much that your surprised you lived the shoes fitting. you hear dylans muffled voice from inside the shoe rock hard to you material say: you know you feel really good as a insole so enjoy the rest of your day he says.he the heads to his moms car.as you lay under the foot you feel the pressure lift up from you for a fraction of a second then slam down with even more force. this process continues for 5 minutes while he goes to the car.once inside the car you are stuck listening to dylan and damiens muffled voices outside you nice smelly, hellish prison. at one point dylan lifts the front of his foot freeing you.
15431.title: the roller coaster of HELL!

info.brief_description: You shrink and are stuck in some interesting situations with friends
info.description:
Rules: *Pretty much anything goes.
*I would Prefer less female dominate interaction as there are Dozens of other works out their for that.
